name: AWS Cloud Practitioner & Solutions Architect
description: Master AWS fundamentals and learn to design scalable, secure cloud solutions. Perfect for beginners and professionals looking to get AWS certified.
topics: AWS Core Services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda)

name: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals & Administration
description: Comprehensive Azure training covering cloud fundamentals, resource management, and Azure administration essentials.

name: DevOps Engineering Bootcamp
description: End-to-end DevOps training covering CI/CD, containerization, orchestration, and automation. Hands-on labs with real-world projects.

name: Ethical Hacking & Penetration Testing
description: Learn ethical hacking techniques, penetration testing methodologies, and how to identify and fix security vulnerabilities.
